REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0097 reute u f BC-WESTPAC-IN-N.Z.-RAISE 04-02 0106

TEXT.TITLE: WESTPAC IN N.Z. RAISES INDICATOR LENDING RATE
TEXT.BODY: Westpac Banking Corp in New Zealand said it will increase its indicator lending rate by 1.5 percentage points to 22.5 pct from April 7. Westpac said in a statement the increase reflects high costs of funding. The bank said nervousness in the wholesale deposit market is creating uncertainty about the immediate outlook for interest rates. Liquidity is expected to remain tight over the next month and this will put upward pressure on interest rates. Base lending indicator rates of the other three trading banks range between 21.0 pct and 21.5 pct. REUTER
